description:
In the 21st century, the characters of Fist of the North Star are living in peaceful Japan. In particular, Kenshirou is a convenience store worker, Raoh works at a factory, and wracked by illness, Toki is looking for work. The legend of the Fighting NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training) North Star begins in the modern day."
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Pt. 1-
In his search for the End of the Century, Kenshiro comes upon "End of the Century Academy," where Lin mistakes him for a transfer student and takes him to the Second-Year Rice Class. Then, out of nowhere, Zeed and the Trumps attack!
Pt. 2-
Seeking to become Student Council President and get the school under his thumb, Shin challenges Kenshiro to a fight. Kenshiro defeats the Trumps on the way to the Black Class, but waiting for him when he arrives is... a giant pig?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisai Seikimatsu Miitsuketa / Akutou to Sono Otomodachi
I Found a Minor End of the Century / The Villain and His Friends
J`ai trouvé une petite fin de siècle / La crapule et ses amis
小さい世紀末見ーつけた / 悪党とそのおともだち

REGULAR.description:
Pt. 3- Peace is restored to End of the Century Academy, when Toki and Raoh appear, hoping to join the school. Ryuken will only allow one of them to join, and gives them a mission to determine who that will be.
Pt. 4- Ryuken gives the brothers a new mission: to fix the school`s clock tower, which is running slow. But upon arriving at the soaring structure with its solid gold flag at the top, they find...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dango wa Naku Tomo 3 Kyoudai / Tokeidai no Elevator
Les trois frères / L`ascenseur de la tour de l`école
Three Brothers (Not Dango) / The Clock Tower`s Elevator
だんごはなくとも3兄弟 / 時計台のエレベーター

REGULAR.description:
The brothers` next mission is to travel to the nurse`s office and retrieve band-aids, but they`re forced to rush around the school when they find out the office has moved. Nurse Yuria sends the brothers a postcard inviting them to join her in Hokkaido, so they off on Toki`s bicycles to join her on her vacation. With a hundred hostages cheering him on, Shuu challenges Thouzer to a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oui, allons à l`infirmerie / À vélo, c`est la route de la mort
Souda! Hokenshitsu ni Ikou 3 Kyoudai Hen / Maji de Chari de Desu Douro
Yes, Let`s Go to the Nurse`s Office / A Serious Bicycle Death Road
そうだ! 保健室に行こう3兄弟編 / マジでチャリでデス道路

REGULAR.description:
The three brothers are offered a free pass to the nurse`s office in exchange for vanquishing a ghost in the bathroom. Toki explains how he got into the black market business. Thouzer challenges Kenshiro to a fight. But this one little kid in a turban breaks his heart with his constant interference...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakkou no Kaidan no Kaidan / Yamu Yamu Yamy Toki-san to Umai Hanashi
Les histoires de fantômes en revenant à l’école / L`envers de l`ombre, les affaires alléchantes de Toki
The School Stair Ghost Scare / Blick, Block, Black! Toki-san`s Sweet Deal
学校のカイダンのカイダン / ヤムヤムヤミー トキさんとうまい話

REGULAR.description:
Part 1 - The class takes a field trip to the great pyramid of Hokuto, where the guide, Thouzer, is eager to get Ryuken to rack up as much debt as possible.
Part 2 - Raoh engages earnestly with their next mission, the writing End of the Century Academy`s school song. But he`s soon stymied by the list of unacceptable words...
Strawberry Flavor - Thouzer captures the child in the turban so that he can concentrate on the fight with Kenshiro. But when the child disappears from his restraints, Thouzer feels the weight of imminent danger pressing down upon him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au moins, la pyramide est là / Allons enfants de la fin du siècle
Nani wa Naku Tomo Pyramid / Kouka Fukou ka Kouka na Kouka
You Can`t Do Without a Pyramid! / Right or Wrong, a Strong School Song!
なにはなくともピラミッド / こうかフコーカコーカな校歌

REGULAR.description:
Pt. 1: When Raoh goes to Fudo`s house to give him a print-out he missed, he ends up stuck to Fudo`s body! Unable to escape, he is forced to experience Fudo`s bizarre lifestyle first-hand...
Pt. 2: Rihaku holds a quiz show to ask the characters about various school anime-appropriate subjects, but the questions all turn out to be bizarre. There`s a twist ending, too!
Strawberry: No matter how many times Kenshiro beats him, Thouzer refuses to let his soul be broken. He pours out his heart about the tragic memories from his youth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Best Ep Evar / Happiness from a Hidebu Quiz
Kamikai / Hidebuna Quiz de Oshiawase
L`épisode divin / Le jeu de la mort et du bonheur
神回 / ひでぶなクイズでおシアワセ

REGULAR.description:
Part 1: Toh presents a counting song about her blissful married life with Raoh.
Part 2: Shin returns to End of the Century Academy, takes back his student ID, and tries to kidnap Yuria! Strawberry Flavor: Thouzer, Shin, Juda, Rei, and Shu offer an interview commemorating the debut of their new idol unit, Nanto DE 5MEN.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le chant des années de Toh / Poivrons et palpitations
Toh`s Counting Song / Green Peppers for Fried Rice, but Beans for Story
Tou no Kazoe Uta / Chaahan Piiman Hanashi mo Piiman
トウのかぞえ歌 / チャーハンピーマン話もピーマン

REGULAR.description:
Ryuken has been murdered! If they want to get their student ID, the three brothers must find the true culprit. When Ryuken and Yuria take a tumble down the stairs together, they accidentally switch bodies. The strange situation is complicated even further when Shin arrives... Thouzer and his gang make their passionate singing debut as Nanto DE5MEN`s first single is unveiled.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le meurtre de Ryûken / Je suis elle, mais elle, c`est qui ?
Ryuken`s Murder Case / I`m Him, and Who`s He?
Ryuuken Ansatsu Jiken / Ore ga Aitsu de Aitsu wa Dare Da?
リュウケン暗殺事ケン / おれがあいつであいつはダレだ?

REGULAR.description:
The principal has hired his favorite idol, Asuka, to perform at the school. There are rumors that someone might try to lick her, so the three brothers must act as her bodyguards.The Seed Class is performing the story of Momotaro for the school arts festival. But no one can decide who should play the leading part... Shin, unable to confess his feelings to Kenshiro, tries various things to get his attention.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol Aidora Aidoreba / Anime DD Han Momotarou Da yo
Idol, Idoled, Idoling / It`s an Anime DD-Version Momotaro
Vedette en quête de fête / Momotarô version DD animé
アイドルアイドらアイドれば / アニメDD版モモタローだよ

REGULAR.description:
End of the Century Academy is offering a voice actor course, but only one student, Airi, joins. The three brothers also study the art of voice acting, and compete with her at an audition. A student teacher named comes to the Seed Class. She immediately grabs the hearts of the students, and takes them on an adventure. The surprising past for Fudo the Demon is told, and we catch a glimpse into Emperor Thouzer`s strange everyday life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est ça, le doublage ? / Mamiya et les mamilescents !
Is This What a Voice Actor Is? / Mam up with Youth!
Kore ga Seiyuu nanoka? / Mamire Seishun
これが声優なのか? / まみれ青春

REGULAR.description:
Ryuken ends up hanging from the top of End of the Century Tower, with Yuria`s office on the other end. Moving towards either one will accept the balance. What will Kenshiro and Raoh do? Toki gets lost in a strange city while going to the convenience store for Ryuken. Starving, he steals a loaf of bread, and is forced to hide from pursuit in a local house, where a little girl mistakes him for Santa Claus. The members of Nanto barge uninvited into Juda`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brothers Space / A Sudden Christmas Carol
Brothers in Space / Chant de Noël à l`improviste
Kyoudai Uchuu / Christmas Carol wa Totsuzen ni
兄弟宇宙 / クリスマスキャロルは突然に

REGULAR.description:
Han, Hyoh, and Kaioh have come from their own schools to attack End of the Century Academy. And they`re after... Ryuken?! The three brothers get over their hesitance and join Shin, Mr. Seed Rice, the Seed Class, Devil Ribako, Rin, and Bat in defending the school. How will the final conflict turn out?! The final battle rages between Kenshiro and Thouzer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haribote Choujou Sakusen / Haribote yo Eien ni
La tactique de l`ornement / Ornement pour toujours
The Ultimate Papier-mache Plan / Papier-mache, Be Eternal
ハリボテ頂上作戦 / ハリボテよ永遠に
Opening
Ending

DD Fist of the North Star 2: Strawberry Flavor Plus
